metadata.title: CVE-2020-15649 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Given an installed malicious file picker application, an attacker was ableto steal and upload local files of their choosing, regardless of theactually files picked. *Note: This issue only affected Firefox for Android.Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 68.11.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
